Structs/NonBlockingFileIO/Error.html#/s:.name: descriptorSetToNonBlocking
Structs/NonBlockingFileIO/Error.html#/s:.abstract: NonBlockingFileIO is meant to be used with file descriptors that are set to the default (blocking) mode.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.name: defaultThreadPoolSize
Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: The default and recommended size for NonBlockingFileIO‘s thread pool.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Read a FileRegion in chunks of chunkSize bytes on NonBlockingFileIO‘s private thread

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Read byteCount bytes in chunks of chunkSize bytes from fileHandle in NonBlockingFileIO‘s private thread

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Read a FileRegion in NonBlockingFileIO‘s private thread pool which is separate from any EventLoop thread.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Read byteCount bytes from fileHandle in NonBlockingFileIO‘s private thread pool which is separate from any EventLoop thread.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Read byteCount bytes starting at fileOffset from fileHandle in NonBlockingFileIO‘s private thread pool

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.name: readFileSize(fileHandle:eventLoop:)
Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Returns the length of the file associated with fileHandle.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.name: write(fileHandle:buffer:eventLoop:)
Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Write buffer to fileHandle in NonBlockingFileIO‘s private thread pool which is separate from any EventLoop thread.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Write buffer starting from toOffset to fileHandle in NonBlockingFileIO‘s private thread pool which is separate from any EventLoop thread.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.name: openFile(path:eventLoop:)
Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Open the file at path for reading on a private thread pool which is separate from any EventLoop thread.

Structs/NonBlockingFileIO.html#/s:8NIOPo.abstract: Open the file at path with specified access mode and POSIX flags on a private thread pool which is separate from any EventLoop thread.

Classes/ServerBootstrap.html.name: ServerBootstrap
Classes/ServerBootstrap.html.abstract: A ServerBootstrap is an easy way to bootstrap a ServerSocketChannel when creating network servers.

Classes/ClientBootstrap.html.name: ClientBootstrap

Classes/NIOPipeBootstrap.html.name: NIOPipeBootstrap
Classes/NIOPipeBootstrap.html.abstract: A NIOPipeBootstrap is an easy way to bootstrap a PipeChannel which uses two (uni-directional) UNIX pipes

Classes/MultiThreadedEventLoopGroup.html.abstract: An EventLoopGroup which will create multiple EventLoops, each tied to its own NIOThread.

Classes/NIOThreadPool.html.name: NIOThreadPool
Classes/NIOThreadPool.html.abstract: A thread pool that should be used if some (kernel thread) blocking work
